Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has introduced two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

Title: EU Demands Microsoft Provide Data on Bing AI Risks or Face Fines
Description: The European Commission is demanding that Microsoft provide information on the risks associated with generative AI features in its Bing search engine or potentially face fines.

Title: Microsoft PC Manager Recommends Bing as a 'Fix'
Description: Microsoft's PC Manager app is recommending users switch their default search engine to Bing as part of its PC optimization recommendations.

Title: TikTok Testing 60-Minute Video Uploads
Description: TikTok is currently experimenting with allowing users to upload videos up to 60 minutes in length.

Title: Order with Google for Food Delivery to End in June
Description: Google is discontinuing its 'Order with Google' integration for food delivery services like Uber Eats, DoorDash, and GrubHub at the end of June.

Title: Former Bing AI Head Joins Perplexity
Description: Mikhail Parakhin, the former head of Bing Search and Microsoft Advertising, has joined the advisory board of AI search startup Perplexity.

Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Rolling Out
Description: Google is rolling out AI-powered summaries for Google Ads campaigns, offering advertisers an overview of campaign performance.

Title: How to Remove Content From Google's AI Overviews
Description: Instructions and strategies for website owners who wish to remove their content from Google's AI-generated overviews in search results.
